name: CryoDream
description:
CryoDream .2


This version of CryoDream was made for Ludum Dare 38 under the theme "A Small World".

My friend Bruno came over on Saturday and ended up staying for the duration of the jam. We hadn't seen each other in a while, so we spent the weekend catching up, sharing war stories and banana cake, playing Isaac and messing around with Construct 2.

This is the result of our encounter, a perpetual distortion machine meant as a cognitive stim-pack for cryo-sleepers and mechanical brains. Sit back, relax, and enjoy the mind-melt!


v0.2.LD38 — 2017.4.25
* it moves!
* toggle auto-generation (tap/click/spacebar)
* shader improvements
* squashed a few bugs

v0.1 — 2017.4.14
* initial release
